title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured online store with product management, cart functionality, and secure checkout. Built with scalability in mind using microservices architecture.

title: Task Management System
description: Collaborative task manager with real-time updates, team workspaces, and progress tracking. Implements role-based access control.

title: Cloud Infrastructure Dashboard
description: A centralized dashboard to monitor AWS resources including EC2 instances and S3 buckets. Visualizes metrics using CloudWatch data.

title: DevOps CI/CD Pipeline
description: Automated deployment pipeline demonstrating continuous integration and delivery. Features automated testing, Docker containerization, and deployment to AWS.

title: Real-time Chat Application
description: Instant messaging application supporting private and group chats. Features message persistence and online status indicators.
